sentences.sentence: All evening her husband contradicted everything she said.
sentences.translation: 整个晚上她说什么丈夫都反驳。

sentences.sentence: When he condescended to speak, he contradicted himself three or four times in the space of half an hour.
sentences.translation: 当他屈尊讲话时，半小时内有三四次前后矛盾。

sentences.sentence: His testimony contradicted that of the preceding witness.
sentences.translation: 他的证词和前一位的互相矛盾。
